component.name: TuxPusher & Friends
component.summary: A fun coin pusher game featuring Tux & Friends!

description.p: Gotta pocket 'em all, Linux Tux! Push the 6 unique Tux figurines into the gold and silver pockets at the end of the pitch before you run out of gold and silver coins! It's always a gamble, and your starting hand is make or break!
Game mechanics that will serve you well to know and use to your advantage.

ul.li: Getting a gold coin in a silver slot rewards you 2x silver coins.
Getting a gold coin in a gold slot rewards you 2x gold coins.
Getting a tux in a slot when you already have the tux gives you 6x gold coins and 6x silver coins.

description.p: Controls: Just move around your mouse and click to release a coin.

There is a command line option that allows you to set the coin deployment speed, but also every time you "lose" a game, the new round will start with a faster deployment speed than the last, just to keep things exciting. ;)
